Joliot-Curie, 15 50-383 WrocławPhone: +48 71 375 7817Email: jby [at] cs [dot] uni [dot] wroc [dot] plShort bioIn 2008 obtained my PhD from the TU Eindhoven after studying, under the supervision of Karen Aardal at CWI in Amsterdam and Algorithms group at TU Eindhoven. 2008-2009: PostDoc in Combinatorial Optimization group at TU Eindhoven. 2009-2010: PostDoc in Discrete Optimization group at EPFL. 2013: habilitation. Since 2021: full professor.NewsBCR has integrality gap less than 2, see https://arxiv.org/abs/2407.19905. ResearchTopicsDiscrete Optimization,Location and Covering Problems,Network Design,LP-rounding Approximation Algorithms,Randomized Rounding Techniques.Publicationslisting form DBLP, Google Scholar. AwardsSTOC 2010 best paper award,Witold Lipski prize . PhD studentsBartosz Rybicki (graduated in 2016),Krzysztof Sornat (graduated in 2019),Mateusz Lewandowski (graduated in 2020),Jan Marcinkowski (graduated in 2022),Fateme Abbasi (graduated in 2025).PostdocsJoachim Spoerhase (in 2016),Meesum Syed Mohammad (2017-2020),Martin Boehm (2020-2021),Sandip Banerjee (2021 - 2023),Yongho Shin (2024 - ).Teaching A course related to  Linear Programming (Network Design in 2025), spring of odd years,Algorithmic Game Theory, spring of even years,Consultations: room 244 (appointments via email please).Other servicesEditorialAssociate editor of Discrete OptimizationConference organizationIPCO 2024 (local chair)ALGO 2014 (local co-chair)SCSC chair of APPROXPC membersipICALP (track A) 2019, 2025IPCO 2024SODA 2024WAOA 2023 (PC co-chair)LAGOS 2021, 2023ESA 2017, 2022APPROX 2020 (PC chair)WADS 2019COCOON 2017, 2018, 2019TTCS 2017CIAC 2017FUN 2016MFCS 2015ISCO 2012Report abuseReport abuse
